summary: A save game that puts you right before the choice Harkon offers you. No other quest or skill progression has been done, allowing you potentially to become a Vampire Lord right from the beginning of your player.
descriptionHtml: A save game that puts you right before the choice Harkon offers you. No other quest or skill progression has been done, allowing you potentially to become a Vampire Lord right from the beginning of your player. For Roleplaying sake, the character is called Vlad but you can use the race menu to change it to anything you want. Will you become the Vampire Lord of his namesake or reject that dark destiny?
author: Koji Okida
